title.text: Multilingual Semantic Role Labelling with Markov Logic

abstractContent.text: This paper presents our system for the CoNLL 2009 Shared Task on Syntactic and Semantic Dependencies in Multiple Languages (Hajič et al., 2009).

entities.text: CoNLL 2009 Shared Task on Syntactic and Semantic Dependencies in Multiple Languages

abstractContent.text: In this work we focus only on the Semantic Role Labelling (SRL) task.
We use Markov Logic to define a joint SRL model and achieve the third best average performance in the closed Track for SRLOnly systems and the sixth including for both SRLOnly and Joint systems.
